summary: Completed comprehensive testing of HR features including feature flags, audit trail, and Indigo styling across HR subpages
passed_tests: HR Feature Flags API - Get and Update operations
HR Audit Logs API - List and pagination
HR Hub Export Blueprint PDF button functionality
Feature Flags page loads and toggles display properly
Audit Trail page loads with empty state
HR subpages (People, Payroll, Leave) load with Indigo accents
All HR pages load without React Hook errors
Indigo styling applied across HR modules
HR feature flags integration with audit trail
